articles.title: BTS’ Jimin Reveals Tracklist for Seven-Song Solo Album ‘MUSE’ - Billboard
articles.description: BTS' Jimin released the tracklist for his 7-song sophomore solo album, 'MUSE,' which will feature collabs with Sofia Carson and Korean rapper Loco.
